author: Mike Chiari
title: Japanese Prime Minister: IOC President '100% Agrees' to Postpone 2020 Olympics
description: Japanese Prime Minister  Shinzo  Abe said Tuesday that International Olympic Committee President  Thomas Bach is in agreement with his proposal that the 2020 Summer Olympics should be postponed one year because of the  coronavirus  pandemic...
content:
Eugene Hoshiko/Associated Press
Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe said Tuesday that International Olympic Committee President Thomas Bach is in agreement with his proposal that the 2020 Summer Olympics should be postponed one year because of the coronavirus… [+877 chars]
